text: Monica Mundu is an Indian playback singer and actor. She has sung songs in 12 languages including Nagpuri, Bhojpuri, Bengali, Hindi, Munda, Santal, Khortha and Kurukh. Her mother tongue is Bengali. Her first film was Jharkhand kar Chhaila, She also acted in film M.S.
